name: Castform

ability.name: Sandstorm
ability.effect: When someone attaches an Energy to a Pokemon, deal 10 damage to that Pokemon, unless it is a Ground, Rock, or Metal Energy. When you attach an Energy to Castform, you may search your deck for another card named Castform, replace it with this one, and shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Stone Edge
attacks.effect: Flip two coins. If both are tails, this attack does nothing.

flavor: Castform are pernicious creatures that change with the weather.
